markdown: **Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> Interact (sonic);  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You pull the white thread free, then whirl the sling in circles at high speed. It lets out an ear-piercing wave of sound. Each creature in a 30-foot cone takes 4d6 sonic damage (DC 21 basic Fortitude save). Any creature that fails is [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=8) for 1 round, or 1 hour on a critical failure.
name: Interact (sonic)
